func mark(self: NazoPuyo; endStepIndex = -1): MarkResult {.inline, noinit,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Marks the steps in the Nazo Puyo. If endStepIndex is negative, all steps are used. This function requires that the field is settled. Source   Edit
